Римейк классической игры 1999 года Counter-Strike. Вы мечтали когда нибудь поиграть в Counter-Strike на движке Source Engine? Пожалуйста! Просто купите диск, или же приобретите цифровую версию в Steam Store. И насладитесь, римейком Counter-Strike. В Counter-Strike: Source играют уже более 60 000 тысяч человек. Присоединяйтесь!
- Отработанная механика игры с 2004 года
- Новая баллистика оружия
- Система достижений
- Реалистичная физика
- Классические карты на новом движке

Counter-Strike: Source ist auch nach Jahren noch ein genialer Mehrspieler-Shooter mit unverwüstlichen Spielprinzip. Egal ob Terrorist oder Spezialeinheit, beide Seite treten mit einem gut ausbalancierten Waffenarsenal an. Auf de-Karten ist es die Aufgabe der Terroristen, Bomben an dafür vorgesehenen Plätzen zu platzieren & detonieren zu lassen, während die Gegenseite dies verhindern muss. Alternativ kann man als Spezialeinheit auf den cs-Karten Geiseln befreien, die von Terroristen gefangen gehalten werden.

Nach wie vor funny, dank diverser Mods & großer Community sehr langlebig.

this game is shit, i dont understand all the fuss. there is no tutorial and the game/selection screen is just the worst i have ever seen. after playing for about half an hour i still only know how to shoot a pistol, and stab with a knife. i dont know what the "BUY" button is. so i am running around with my knife getting chased by terrorists with sniper rifles ands SMGs. if this game had a face, i would punch it.

It can be intensely frustrating if you are new as you will die frequently and spend most of your time waiting for the game to finish. However once you get the hang of it you will find an exhilarating co-op tactical shooter, that still holds its own, despite its age.

Finally, after Playing Counter-Strike Source for Over 100 Hours I can preety much say that this game is probably the Best Online First Person Shooter ever made.
The Community is Colossal, There are a Sh*t load of Servers.
But it's not the Amazingly Big Community that makes this game so Big.
It's the Gameplay, easy to play, Hard to Master. It's actually a FPS that takes skill. CS:S doesn't use Killsteaks or Perks or any Gadjets and/or Gimmicks, just your Gun.

To those that STILL haven't played this game, please go Buy it Now. Forget the "Non-Crysis-Realistic" Graphics. In CS:S all you want is to have fun, and that is the Reason why I play Video-Games. 

To Have Fun.

Counter-Strike: Source is a remake of the original Counter-Strike with Valves Source Engine. This brings in better graphics and smoother game play. The game is still a multiplayer only game with no campaign but has more mods and custom maps than before. I still think this game is a great classic and has become one of the most popular games of all time. The game still has thousands of players playing the game today. The only downfall of the game is that Valve does not really bring in new content anymore and has never really have.

CSS is the top multilayer fps for pc and will be around for ages.  The game tends to not have mercy on those new to shooters but if you can jump through the first few hoops, the game is fun to play.  There are a few other game modes that are not just people killing each other round after round.  Gun Game and Zombie mods are always fun to try out.

Pretty hard for anyone not to know about CSS but if you are one of those, go and youtube gameplay and see if you like.
Awesome game. Everyone likes Counter-Strike :D

A very entertaining game, to say the least!  A (mostly) realistic online/offline multiplayer shooter with a strong community.  The official maps are balanced and fun, and the wealth of custom maps and mods will keep you busy for the next millennium!

Не жалею ни одной секунды, отданной этой игре. Начинал играть в нее в 2006 году, играл на пиратской версии, но в 2010 году смог раздобыть лицензионный диск. Переиграны более 30 модов и каждый был крут, каждый доставил массу воспоминаний, нашел много знакомых и друзей, с некоторыми общаюсь до сих  пор.( хотя за спиной 15 лет). И даже сейчас игра на плаву. Спасибо за все!
